title: CrossEncoder Reranker
author: Abhijeet Gorai
description: The CrossEncoderReranker class utilizes a cross-encoder model, such as cross-encoder/ms-marco-MiniLM-L-6-v2, to rerank documents based on their similarity to a query. It employs SentenceTransformers' CrossEncoder to evaluate query-document pairs, generating relevance scores for each document. The rerank method returns a sorted list of documents based on their computed relevance scores, making it highly suitable for tasks involving precise document ranking and information retrieval.
